thread.title: Boeing to make aircraft seats with Adient

title: Boeing to make aircraft seats with Adient
text:
Boeing to make aircraft seats with Adient   01:09 
Boeing is forming a joint venture with car seat maker Adient to produce seats for planes to reduce delays in plane deliveries. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Boeing is forming a joint venture with car seat maker Adient to produce seats for planes to reduce delays in plane deliveries. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Ba1deD
